title: 2stout
author: 2stout
created_time: September 16, 2022, 07:27:16 PMLast edit: September 18, 2022, 06:58:38 PM by 2stout
content: In total, 10 test pieces were produced per OneNattyLitecoin.  Of the test pieces produced, only 7 were made publicly available- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5126055.msg50371172#msg50371172.  In this auction, 2 of the 7 publicly available test pieces are up for auction and 1 publicly unavailable test piece is available as well for 3 total test pieces, all ICG slabbed and graded.  The main distinguisher of the test pieces vs the production release is instead of a serial # on the hologram, DAYBREAK is on the hologram; also, the Rose Gold plate was only available as a test pieces as it did not make the production cut.  I know the pics show timestamp of 14 Sept 2022- delays due to life circumstances, but rest assured and promise that these are mine and in my possession- not escrow opposed and can provide additional pics if requested.END TIME: 5 pm (1700) US ET, Sun 18 September 2022. Each bid in the last 10 minutes extends deadline by 10 minutes.  If within those 10 extended minutes a new bid is made, 10 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?iso=20220918T17&p0=179&msg=%5BAUCTION%5D+NaTTyMiNd+DayBreak+100VIA+Antique+Test+Pieces+x+3&font=slabStarting Bid Lot 1: 0.005BTCStarting Bid Lot 2: 0.005BTCStarting Bid Lot 3: 0.005BTCMinimum Bid Increment: 0.0001BTCCoin Specs: 39mm, Reeded EdgeMetal: 1 Oz .999 AgHologram Type: "DAYBREAK" (Limited to 10 Test pieces)Denomination: 100 Viacoin (FUNDED)Lot 1- Antique Silver:  Address and Funding:  https://explorer.viacoin.org/address/Vv5BUzMKUQ5nQ7B8mHvMF5YjNx1KUWiTEkLot 2- Antiqued, Gold Plated:  Address and Funding:  https://explorer.viacoin.org/address/VgFMpZKvsXCEteewaBWK6jngRhJq71ZtDVLot 3- Antiqued, Rose Gold Plated:  Address and Funding:  https://explorer.viacoin.org/address/Vvumyswc9RsjvpPjQ9qWpEqi73APRVpsB7Address Strips:***Local rule: Please limit posts to bids or comments/questions about the auction item(s).***Escrow: minerjones at buyer's expense.Shipping:  USA- USPS Priority Mail free/included.  Worldwide- USPS International Priority Mail- 0.002 BTC; however, winner(s) responsible for any local customs/duties/VAT fees.  Item(s) ship from the USA.  I can also ship to minerjones at no cost; however, you will need to work out reship with him.  Note, if you win more than 1 item, shipping will be combined, meaning the shipping charges don't change or increase.*-Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!-*Bitcoin/BTC to this address only:  1KZisMXve4gvLwSngigyS2BDBuR3xiXLLrSnipe rules:1)  Any bid made in last 10 minutes will extend the auction 10 minutes beyond the ending time.2)  If within those 10 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 10 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.Good Luck and Thanks for participating!  Let me know if there are any questions.
